items.title: War of words heats up between Trump, Illinois leaders over Chicago
items.description: The war of words between Illinois leaders and the Trump administration heated up over the weekend.

items.title: Hawaii under state of emergency ahead of Hurricane Kiko
items.description: A state of emergency has been issued in Hawaii ahead of possible inclement weather posed by Hurricane Kiko, officials said.
